title: 22a02.             Scope of 541 exemptions.
text:
29
U.S.C. § 213(a)(1) exemptions apply only to certain types of “white collar”
employees who meet the salary and duties tests and who are employed as bona
fide executive, administrative, professional, computer, and outside sales
employees, as 29 CFR part 541 defines each of these terms.  Manual laborers or
other “blue collar” workers do not qualify for exemption under 29 CFR part 541. 29
CFR  § 541.3(b)
html:
29 U.S.C. § 213(a)(1) exemptions apply only to certain types of “white collar” employees who meet the salary and duties tests and who are employed as bona fide executive, administrative, professional, computer, and outside sales employees, as 29 CFR part 541 defines each of these terms.  Manual laborers or other “blue collar” workers do not qualify for exemption under 29 CFR part 541.

 

29 CFR  § 541.3(b)
